content: on the let s knit magazine website this is available under the name sands baby blanket 1 and on rays of hope it is called easy baby blanket with lace option 2 **overview ** a square baby blanket knit on the diagonal in garter stitch with optional lace border **from designer ** > this lace border makes the easy blanket very special use the lace all around for a shawl or on the top edge only for a crib or pram blanket the blanket is our basic pattern you can use any wool and needles to suit to give a soft drape this pattern knits to approx a 24 square it will always come square so the size is up to you **note ** this pattern is for limited non-commercial educational and personal use only yarn requirements only state that you need 200g of dk-weight yarn yardage estimate here based on several common brands of dk wool 1 http //www letsknit co uk/index php/knitting_patterns/free_knitting_pattern/sands_baby_blanket/ 2 http //www bbc co uk/stoke/content/articles/2006/04/15/easy_baby_blanket_with_lace_feature shtml
